title: "Socure Wins 2020 Finovate Award for Best Use of AI/ML"
excerpt: "Socure, the leader in Day Zero identity verification, today announced it has won the 2020 Finovate Award for Best Use of AI/ML. The Finovate awards were created to recognize excellence in the fintech community both on the part of companies who are driving innovation and the individuals who are bringing new ideas to life."
